summary: drm/msm/a6xx: Fix kvzalloc vs state_kcalloc usage
details:
drm/msm/a6xx: Fix kvzalloc vs state_kcalloc usage

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit 4b1bbc0571a5d7ee10f754186dc3d619b9ced5c1, it was introduced in version v6.0.7 by commit ecd63b2fbabc8fd6e5355c25fe1e186a74fa5272. For more details please see the references link.
